title: Upcoming reworks.
body:
I just want to start by saying that I am not a qualified game designer, I have however been playing games for just about my whole life, and I think I might have some worthwhile ideas for some upcoming reworks.

The two that I want to talk about, are {{champion:10}} and {{champion:17}}, two champions I have recently heard are going under the knife soon.
(also Morgana? You REALLY hate spellvamp, eh? :P)

I'm unranked and have spent most of the last year on League playing arams, so I can't really talk about balance across all elos, but here we go.

Kayle: When I read that Kayle was up for a rework I had no idea what you'd want to change, but then I remembered that her ultimate has no cost and came up with this idea. 
Kayle should be able to cast her ult whenever it's up, absolutely, but it shouldn't be free, not something that powerful.
I feel like the cost of her ult, should be "100% of current mana." Hear me out.
For every X mana Kayle spends, could extend the duration of her ult, or apply some other form of buff to her target?
This way, Kayle can still cast her ult for as low as 1 mana, so it is always available to her, but now the Kayle player has a lot more to consider.
Also {{item:3165}}.

Now... Teemo. Every part of his kit is sort of iconic, but a friend and I came up with a few ideas.

The death of AP stealth hamster: All of Teemo's AP scalings could be removed and replaced with AD scalings, removing his early spikes and bursty nature.

The return of the sith: E ratios down, Teemo passively gaines 1%/2%/3%/4%/5% spellvamp (;)) scaling with rank.

A friend of mine came up with the idea that Teemo's poison could stack up to a blind, instead of his Q applying it immediately. Meaning that Teemo would need to land R, E, Q to proc the blind on a target. This would still allow Teemo to use his passive for assassinations, he just needs to be a little smarter about it.

Feel free to tell me these ideas are terrible, it's a subject I enjoy thinking about, and if my thoughts can be of use, then that's gg :)

Thanks for the read.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
I don't find Kayle's changes plausible personally simply because she has to deplete whatever that's left completely to use it every time. I can get behind that you are trying to force Kayle use it as a last resort "all in" thingy rather than it being used as a trading or initiation tool, but what's more likely to happen with a kit that rigid is that people would probably just stop playing her altogether. And that's isn't what we want to see. I think you are on the right track but the execution imo needs more work.

In terms of Teemo, I personally don't find it plausible to have him get spell vamp directly in his kit, because that would be literally confirming the fan favourite of "Teemo is Satan" joke being literally canon, which well... But with your idea about switching Teemo's scaling ratio, I think that's a good one, but instead of making everything AD instead of AP, I think mixing them up is a better idea. And last by no means least, I like the idea that Teemo's blind would need to be stacked to get, though I'd prefer the requirement wouldn't be so harsh about it, however a neat concept nevertheless.
Thank you very much for your constructive comments :) My favourite discussions are when people disagree with me and are able to explain their reasons :)
